statement: MultiPlan Corporation, a healthcare cost management solutions provider, announced a comprehensive refinancing to extend its debt maturities. Leveraging technology, data analytics, and industry expertise, MultiPlan interprets clients' needs and customizes innovative solutions that enhance cost management, quality, and transparency in healthcare. The refinancing extends the maturity of MultiPlan's entire debt capital structure and enhances its financial flexibility.
introduction: MultiPlan Corporation (MPLN), a healthcare technology provider, has announced a comprehensive refinancing to extend its debt maturities.

statement: International Seaways Inc. (INSW) will replace Consolidated Communications Holdings (CNSL) in the S&P SmallCap 600 index, effective December 30. This change comes after Searchlight Capital Partners and British Columbia Investment Management Corporation (BCI) acquired Consolidated Communications in a deal expected to be completed on that date.
introduction: International Seaways Inc. (INSW) will replace Consolidated Communications Holdings (CNSL) in the S&P SmallCap 600 index on December 30, following CNSL's acquisition by Searchlight Capital Partners and British Columbia Investment Management Corporation.

statement: SciSparc Ltd. (Nasdaq: SPRC) reports that AutoMax Motors Ltd., an Israeli automotive importer with which SciSparc has a merger agreement, has received its initial $13 million shipment of JAC vehicles. SciSparc is a clinical-stage pharmaceutical company focused on developing and commercializing innovative therapies, particularly in the pain management and central nervous system disorders space. The company's wholly-owned subsidiary has a controlling interest in a subsidiary that sells hemp seed oil-based products on Amazon.
introduction: SciSparc Ltd. announces that AutoMax Motors Ltd., an automotive importer and distributor, has received its first $13 million delivery of JAC vehicles.

statement: Intrusion Inc. (INTZ) has recently experienced a surge in stock prices, attributed to a strategic shift in operations and the introduction of an innovative cybersecurity solution. The company's focus on reputation-based software and forensic investigative tools has attracted market attention, leading to a 351.11% increase in stock value. INTZ's offerings include INTRUSION Shield, INTRUSION TraceCop, and Savant, providing advanced network security and investigations capabilities.
introduction: Intrusion Inc.'s (INTZ) stock has gained significant traction due to a breakthrough cybersecurity innovation, with analysts discussing potential strategic shifts in the company's operations.

statement: reAlpha Tech Corp (AIRE), a real estate technology company utilizing artificial intelligence, experienced a significant stock surge of 161.31% due to the launch of its reAlpha Enterprise AI homebuying platform targeting the employee relocation market. Additionally, the company's strategic shift towards embracing cryptocurrency and expanding its AI offerings has contributed to the recent gains. reAlpha Tech offers AI-powered products and services to the real estate industry, including a commission-free homebuying platform and a natural language processing program for property data analysis.
introduction: reAlpha Tech Corp.'s stock price surged due to the launch of its AI-powered homebuying platform targeting the employee relocation market.

statement: Energous Corporation (WATT) is a company that develops wireless charging system solutions, specifically radio frequency-based charging for Internet of Things devices. statement: Nauticus Robotics, Inc. (KITT) is a company that develops ocean robots, cloud software, and services for the ocean industry. The company's products include Aquanaut, an autonomous underwater vehicle with sensor suite, and Olympic Arm, an all-electric manipulator for remotely operated vehicles. Nauticus Robotics has seen a 5.67% increase in its stock price and has a market capitalization of $5.83 million. The company has collaborated with SeaTrepid International to bring its Tool software to remotely operated vehicles, and has received $33 million in convertible debentures. Nauticus Robotics has also been the subject of various news articles and analyst reports, with a media sentiment score of 0.66 indicating positive coverage.
introduction: Nauticus Robotics, Inc. develops ocean robots, cloud software, and services for the ocean industry, with its products and collaborations driving a 5.67% stock price increase and $33 million in funding.

statement: Binah Capital Group, Inc. (BCG) is a wealth management company that offers a range of financial products and services, including stock, bond, and options execution services, as well as research, compliance, and accounting services for financial advisors. The company was founded in 2016 and is headquartered in Albany, New York. introduction: Binah Capital Group, Inc. is a wealth management company that offers financial products and services, including execution, research, and accounting services, with a current market capitalization of $31.93 million.

statement: Westwater Resources, Inc. (WWR) is an energy technology company focused on developing battery-grade natural graphite. The company has announced that it expects to close debt financing for the Kellyton Graphite Plant in January 2025, after progressing through diligence and loan documentation processes. The debt financing will fund the remaining construction costs of the plant. The company has also reported its earnings results for the third quarter and nine months ended September 30, 2023.
introduction: Westwater Resources, Inc. expects to close debt financing for its Kellyton Graphite Plant in January 2025, which will fund remaining construction costs, and has reported its Q3 and 9M 2023 earnings results.

statement: Vor Biopharma Inc. (VOR) has announced a private investment in public equity (PIPE) financing for approximately $55.6 million, which will provide funds to support the development of its lead product, tremtelectogene empogeditemcel (trem-cel), an engineered hematopoietic stem cell product candidate for treating acute myeloid leukemia (AML) and other hematological malignancies.
introduction: Vor Biopharma Inc. has secured a $55.6 million private investment to support the development of its lead product, tremtelectogene empogeditemcel, for treating acute myeloid leukemia and other blood cancers.

statement: Focus Universal Inc. (FCUV), a provider of IoT and 5G technologies, has filed a $100 million mixed securities shelf to raise capital. statement: BIO-key International, Inc. (BKYI), founded in 1993, is a provider of biometric authentication solutions, including finger scanners marketed under the SideSwipe, EcoID, and SidePass brands. The company, headquartered in Wall, New Jersey, offers hardware and software solutions to Fortune 500 companies, government agencies, healthcare organizations, and other entities.

statement: Grid Dynamics Holdings Inc. (GDYN) is set to join the S&P SmallCap 600 index effective January 2nd, replacing Revelyst Inc. (GEAR). This change is part of the annual index rebalancing process, where certain companies are added or removed based on criteria such as market capitalization and liquidity. Strategic Value Partners is acquiring Revelyst in a pending deal, which has contributed to the change.
introduction: Grid Dynamics Holdings Inc. will join the S&P SmallCap 600 on January 2, 2025, replacing Revelyst Inc.

statement: TScan Therapeutics, a clinical-stage biotechnology company, announced a $30 million registered direct offering with Lynx1 Capital Management LP and an investment fund advised by Lynx1. The proceeds from the sale of pre-funded warrants will be used to strengthen TScan's liquidity position and advance its development of T cell receptor-engineered T cell therapies for cancer treatment. This investment follows TScan's refinancing of its existing debt facility with Silicon Valley Bank and comes after the company filed a registration statement with the SEC in November 2022, which was declared effective in May 2023.
introduction: TScan Therapeutics announces a $30 million registered direct offering with Lynx1 Capital Management LP.
